about_the_game:
It’s tough fighting evil by moonlight and being a normal 90s kid by daylight! Can you save your city’s dreams from invading monsters, halt a magical plague in its tracks, and still help your new club prepare for the school festival in time?

Star Crystal Warriors Go! is an interactive novel by Holly McMasters. It's entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

Ever since that talking animal showed up and gave you magical powers, you’ve become a Stellaria, a magical teenage warrior who can protect people’s dreams from the terrifying monsters you call Nightmares. Lately, your own dreams have been filled with visions of a crystal castle and a love that feels like a memory.

How will you handle the Nightmares that threaten your city? Will you heal them with compassion or punish them with your magic? And who’s this true love you’re dreaming about? Is it your best friend who knows nothing about your magical adventures? The mysterious vigilante who shows up to every battle with a rose and a piece of pithy advice? Or the beautiful Nightmare with the enigmatic smile?

As you learn the truth behind the Stellaria and the Nightmares, you’ll also learn the truth behind yourself. Will you keep your heart’s Star Crystal full of hope and defeat the Nightmares, or will you fall to despair and join the darkness?

  • Play as male, female, or non-binary; gay, straight, bi, asexual, or poly.
  • Magically manipulate dreams to fight monsters.
  • Build a legacy with your new school club.
  • Solve the mystery of a magical kingdom.
  • Cure a magical sleeping plague.
  • Find love at the school festival’s dance.

Is your magic strong enough to save reality?

name: Star Crystal Warriors Go!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: When nightmare monsters invade your city’s dreams, will you heal them with compassion or destroy them with magic? Defeat evil in this magical girl anime!
